name: I accidently summoned Cthulhu
description:
SOUND ON!!

When the newly joined Cultist takes a crack at the evil spells beyond the supernatural, he accidently creates a summoning ritual and awakens the dark elder god Cthulhu!

How to Play:

Match the incoming runes on the ancient scroll to the runes on the ground, pickup the runes before the incoming rune disappears...but watch out for the tentacles and the madness that creeps into you. 

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Click - Dash

ESC - Main Menu

Credits:
